name: Tabletop RPG Duels - Game System
description:
We present an early prototype of the REI system for TTRPGs! We have developed this system for the B&W Jam 2021.

With a mix of Clue, Shonen Tournaments, and some Cosmic Terror. The game provided here is a tool to play with your friends the RPG called 'A night in the Molder Mansion'.

The game design was tested in Tabletop Simulator. And the rulebook for the RPG will be provided soon.

(Early development) Features:

  1. Single player (learn the game basics).
  2. Multi-player (join with a friend and host a TTRPG duels :O ).

This is an early development. We also have music, illustrations, and other materials to share soon.

Thank you for your interest!

Hajime Studio
